name: Andrii Zakharov
description: - Coordinated version control: reviewed pull requests, resolved merge conflicts, and managed branch strategies.
- Designed and implemented the Shop by Category section on the Home Page.
- Developed the Product Details page with responsive and accessible layout.
- Structured the project architecture for scalability and maintainability.

name: Yaroslava Lazurenko
role: Product Manager | Asana Power User | Store Chief
description: - Developed and maintained the project WBS and Asana workflows, including task assignment and follow-up.
- Designed product cards and implemented product sliders using Swiper.
- Developed “Add to Cart” and “Add to Favorites” functionality.
- Served as the team’s Zustand state-management expert.

name: Stanislav Snizhkovyi
description: - Implemented authentication with Firebase and React Hook Form.
- Performed CRUD with Firebase Realtime Database.
- Created custom React hooks for state and logic reuse.
- Used UI libraries: Tailwind, Base UI, Swiper, React-Toastify, React-Paginate, Skeleton.
- Built a catalog with sorting, pagination, and item count via URL query params.
- Deployed the project to Vercel

name: Danil Dzirun
description: - Modal for checkout.
- Thank you page.
- Breadcrumbs.
- 404 page

name: Yurii Soroka
description: - Developed robust logic for the Favorites and Cart pages.
- Designed and built the Contact page from concept to implementation.
